bug.author: smistad
bug.summary: VTK uses Qt 4, while FAST uses Qt 5
bug.description: VTK interop does not work because of this. May have to build VTK with Qt 5. <denchmark-link:http://www.vtk.org/pipermail/vtk-developers/2014-June/015084.html>http://www.vtk.org/pipermail/vtk-developers/2014-June/015084.html</denchmark-link>
